title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Key Hamas Figure: Hussam Mansour Eliminated in Air Raid”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The head of a department in the internal security apparatus of the terrorist organization Hamas has been eliminated. He was one of the directors of the ‘Al-Khayr’ association, which transfers funds to terrorist organizations under the guise of humanitarian activity.

The IDF eliminated the terrorist, Hussam Mansour, who served as the head of a department in the internal security apparatus of the terrorist organization Hamas, using fighter jets from the Air Force and under the intelligence guidance of military intelligence.

Hussam played a role in Hamas’s military wing and had significant experience in the internal security apparatus. In addition to his role in the apparatus, he participated actively and continuously in maintaining and solidifying Hamas’s rule in the Gaza Strip, while affecting Israel’s efforts in the area.

In addition to the military activity for which he was targeted, Hussam was one of the directors of the ‘Al-Khayr’ association, which transfers funds to terrorist organizations under the cover of humanitarian activity.

Attached is the identification card of Hussam Mansour, head of a department in the internal security apparatus of the terrorist organization Hamas: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC12072024235345
